import Product from "../components/Product"; import data from '../data'; export default function ProductScreen(props) { const data = data.products.find(x => x._id === props.match.params.id); if(!product) { return
Product Not Found
; } return (
  • {product.name}
  • Prix: {product.price}$
  • Description: {product.description}
  • Price
    {product.price}$
  • Status
    {product.countInStock > 0 ? In Stock : Unavailable }
) }
